pr_title: Remove restriction about base fee on eth_sendRawTransaction

timeline.message:
Remove restriction about base fee on eth_sendRawTransaction

Signed-off-by: Abdelhamid Bakhta <abdelhamid.bakhta@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: We can reject local frontier transactions whose gas price is too low? Why do we do that?
timeline.author: RatanRSur

replies.bodyText: I thought we want to be very accepting of local transactions. For example, miners submit payout transactions to their own node with a very low gas price.
replies.author: RatanRSur

replies.bodyText: Well, the behaviour of frontier transactions become the same as it was before. Those use cases are still covered by the --min-gas-price endpoint. Since the actual price of frontier transactions is fixed we can reject those if the price is below the configured --min-gas-price
replies.author: abdelhamidbakhta

replies.bodyText: Ah ok. Then it's not an issue with the diff of this PR but something that's worth discussing about the existing behavior.
replies.author: RatanRSur
